question: Which one of the following was the most immediate factor for the spread of Swadeshi and Boycott agitation during the first decade of the present century?
option1: Curzon’s attempt to control the Universities
option2: Curzon’s design to curtail the sphere of local self-government
option4: Curzon’s plan to curb the growing popularity of the Indian National Congress
explanation: A sentence of 18 months rigorous imprisonment imposed on Lokmanya Tilak and then the partition of Bengal done by Lord Curzon. It started the Swadeshi and Boycott agitation.
